data.Name: KALEO
data.Bio: Kaleo is an Icelandic indie pop / rock / folk band established in 2012 and their first major public appearance Iceland Airwaves Music Festival in November 2012. Their fame came through "Vor í vaglaskógi" as it was included on heavy rotation on Icelandic state broadcaster RÚV's radio station Rás 2 featuring on top of the stations Top 10. Read more on Last.fm

data.Name: KALEO
data.Subtitle: with Matt Maeson and Belle Mt.
data.Description:
KALEO at Red Rocks Amphitheatre on July 21, 2020 and July 19, 2021 has been rescheduled to Monday, May 16, 2022.

There is nothing you need to do as your tickets will be valid for the new date.


AEG Presents is thrilled to announce KALEO live at Red Rocks Amphitheatre on Monday, May 16th, 2022.
